newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso closes slightly lower at 1,044.50.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso closes slightly lower at 1,044.50.

text.p: Colombia's peso closed slightly lower at 1,044.50 after a day of see-saw trading on the country's interbank market, dealers said.
They said the peso hit an intraday high against the dollar of 1,042.25 and a low of 1,046 before settling just 20 centavos lower than Tuesday's close at 1,044.20.

Dealers reported 459 trades for a total of $177 million and said dollar sales by oil exporters and demand for greenbacks by the corporate sector counteracted one another over the course of the trading day.
